nodes.title: I wish I would have
nodes.name: Brennan Q.
nodes.content:
I wish I would have made this purchase sooner. It’s only been 3 week and it has been the best purchase I’ve ever made so far. The classes/instructors are incredible. The bike is beautifully made (bike itself is super quiet) while riding) and the customer service with stryde is Top notch. They will get back to your really quickly with any questions and you can tell they really want to help how ever they can! I highly recommend this bike and bike subscription. 
The stryde bike is the perfect set up for a momma like me. I have 3 young kids at home then with being stuck at home in recent months due to pandemic & a having a immunocompromised child, I could not figure out how I would be able to get out to work out which was important and so needed for both my physical and mental health. The stryde bike was my answer and I’m so happy with my purchase. I couldn’t recommend the stryde bike enough. 10/10

nodes.title: I absolutely love my bike!!
nodes.name: Courtney B.
nodes.content: I absolutely love my bike!! My best purchase.

nodes.title: The bike and the classes
nodes.name: Trevor M.
nodes.content: The bike and the classes are great. And I am very happy to have purchased it. The bike is a bit on the small side. Even adjusted to max height, the handlebars are low for someone in the 6 ft range the seat post is also misaligned which only causes issues when the seat is shifted to the back. Otherwise, very solid build.

nodes.title: Extremely well made- solid construction
nodes.name: Dennis H.
nodes.content: Extremely well made- solid construction with a sleek design. The screen is huge and class selection/search features are terrific. Finally , the classes are fantastic. I love having the option of different class lengths.

nodes.title: Love it
nodes.name: Jenn K.
nodes.content: Love it

nodes.title: Love the bike, classes/instructors are
nodes.name: Jeneen B.
nodes.content: Love the bike, classes/instructors are great and it's becoming a normal part of my day! Highly recommend to anyone in the market.

nodes.title: Overall I love it. Only
nodes.name: Satesh R.
nodes.content:
Overall I love it. Only reason not to give 5 stars is this. The handlebars don't line up straight. Minor manufacturing defect. 
 It would get 5 stars if the monitor had google play to download other apps. I pretty much youtube music lists to work out. I never used the spin classes so having access to other apps would for sure help you overcome Peloton sales.

nodes.title: Excellent quality and the bike
nodes.name: Troy P.
nodes.content: Excellent quality and the bike has exceeded my expectations providing a solid experience over going to the spin studio! I had considered buying a Peleton however have absolutely no regrets going with Stryde!

nodes.title: Nice bike, quiet. My right
nodes.name: David A.
nodes.content: Nice bike, quiet. My right leg hits the seat adjustment handle which is annoying. I have to unplug (and re-plug) the tablet in order for WiFi to reconnect daily which is annoying. You can’t see your ‘stats’ unless you subscribe to Stryde app. I wish I’d known that. I complain but am happy with bike and would recommend.

nodes.title: I love the bike. I
nodes.name: Olena C.
nodes.content: I love the bike. I was considering going with Stryde or Peloton, but ultimately picked Stryde because the tablet is unlocked (so I can use the Stryde app or sometimes just ride to my spotify playlist) and I liked the choreography-based classes more, it's more fun to ride to the music and I focus less on the effort. Great bike, great workout, would definitely recommend.

nodes.title: Love being able to ride
nodes.name: Andie G.
nodes.content: Love being able to ride my favorite local classes from High Ride at home! Delivery took a long time and the bike seat is very uncomfortable so I did have to get a bike seat cover. Other than that love my purchase.

nodes.title: This thing is a little
nodes.name: Renee J.
nodes.content: This thing is a little heavier than I anticipated it would be, but it is solid, SO QUIET, and awesome! I'm so excited to get more use out of it! The tablet is a little hard to figure out and they don't include an instructional guide, but other than that it is fine. I'm still trying to figure out how to add other apps to it, but the download page is coming up in another language....

nodes.title: Very easy assembly, beautiful &
nodes.name: Francesca H.
nodes.content: Very easy assembly, beautiful & sleek design of the bike, fun classes

nodes.title: Great product!
nodes.name: Dalian B.
nodes.content: Great product!

nodes.title: Great so far! Feels solid.
nodes.name: Heidi S.
nodes.content: Great so far! Feels solid. Quiet. Smooth. Can tell quality parts. Workouts are hard and fun. Excited to see updates to the app as it is so new!

nodes.title: Love the ibke
nodes.name: Brandon B.
nodes.content: Love the ibke

nodes.title: We love our bike so
nodes.name: Sierra A.
nodes.content: We love our bike so far! It's good quality and there are a lot of classes available on the app. Also, Styrde's customer service is absolutely fantastic and helped us through a difficulty time getting the bike delivered from the delivery partner.

nodes.title: LOVE this bike, its awesome,
nodes.name: Jose M.
nodes.content: LOVE this bike, its awesome, easy to put together and the tablet was more than I expected..

nodes.title: Easy to assemble, came well
nodes.name: Brittani T.
nodes.content: Easy to assemble, came well packed and very fast and efficient delivery. Love the features of the bike and it’s definitely not an eye sore! The issue I’ve had so far is sometimes the wifi will disconnect from the tablet and it won’t allow me to load any other wifi connections. I’ll have to unplug the tablet and then it will work again.

nodes.title: So far, I am happy
nodes.name: Jessica J.
nodes.content:
So far, I am happy with my stryde bike. I enjoy the stryde app because it allows me to ride with my local spin studio since I can not be there in person. The price point was a huge plus. I was also attracted to the unlocked tablet and the SPD clip style.

PROS: Easy setup, tablet worked immediately out of the box. The bike itself is dense and quality, I am not afraid to ride hard. The tablet is large and extremely easy to use, plus, you can open other content in the browser—the tablet seamlessly connected to my earbuds without issue. The seat is comfortable and easy to adjust. I find that I am achieving the same workout using my stryde as I was in the studio.

CONS: I wish I could slide the handlebar setup horizontally toward the seat. When I put my bike together, the neck of the handlebar setup is slightly off-center, and it appears that it was manufactured this way. The offset handlebars do not interfere with my workout and are more of an aesthetic blemish. I do wish that if I accidentally exited a class, I could just resume it where it closed.

All-in-all, I am pleased with my purchase. There were some shipping difficulties (which was expected due to the climate of things); The stryde team updated me every step of the way! It showed their care and concern for their customers. I am glad I went with stryde, between the content, price, and high-quality customer service, you will not be disappointed.

nodes.title: My reasons behind the purchase
nodes.name: Christine S.
nodes.content: My reasons behind the purchase of the bike were; site indicated a two day delivery vs. other bikes at 60 days, no commitment to subscription services and cost. The delivery was not as indicated or mis-leading but understandable due to the current environment, features and cost were as indicated. So, overall very pleased with the bike, easy to assemble and use. I would highly recommend.

nodes.title: AMAZING. Easily the best customer
nodes.name: Emily B.
nodes.content: AMAZING. Easily the best customer service I have ever dealt with. This bike is the fraction of the price of other competitors, but a truly stable and quiet ride, with a sleek design that looks good in our guest bedroom/office. The classes are great, and we're about to try out the "free ride" feature as an option while watching Netflix if you want something a little more low-key. So happy with this purchase :)

nodes.title: I absolutely adore this bike!
nodes.name: Brianne F.
nodes.content: I absolutely adore this bike! I’m obsessed! I get to continue riding with High Ride from home! What a gift! This works great with my busy work and kid schedule! I can clip in and ride without the commute and without having to coordinate when classes in the studio are offered! Perfect fit for my lifestyle! Thank you Stryde! Beautiful bike too!

nodes.title: Well built piece of equipment,
nodes.name: Mike B.
nodes.content:
Well built piece of equipment, fairly easy to set-up. Main complaint is the monitor is very hard to tighten so it will stay where you want.

The cords that monitor the data wiggle loose easily, if you don’t see any info on the screen you need to push them back in place.

I’ve only taken 5 classes ( 3 the same one) but I have liked each one. They are challenging and are exactly what I was looking for since I no longer belong to a gym with Covid-19 around.

nodes.title: Bike and tablet are great.
nodes.name: Courtney H.
nodes.content: Bike and tablet are great. The camera on the tablet don’t work. When I emailed to inquire they told me it was a mistake and shouldn’t be there for privacy reasons. There is also a Gallery which would be unnecessary if theRe is no camera. The seat is soooo uncomfortable. Both very minor flaws. Over all the bike is great, I’ve used it twice so far. As a beginner who can’t even keep up for 5 minutes I’m excited to see the progress I’ll make. I’ll be purchasing the Stryde app once I’m more comfortable with riding the bike it’s self.

nodes.title: I’m in love! I love
nodes.name: Tamara C.
nodes.content: I’m in love! I love the smooth ride and the accessibility!

nodes.title: It is smooth, quiet and
nodes.name: Patricia C.
nodes.content: It is smooth, quiet and feels very well built.

nodes.title: Everything looks great. I believe
nodes.name: Kelsea T.
nodes.content: Everything looks great. I believe tracking should be a little better to help build the confidence in spending this amount.

nodes.title: Seriously one of the best
nodes.name: Alyssa W.
nodes.content: Seriously one of the best things I've EVER purchased. I am obsessed with the classes and how smooth the bike rides. I even put it together all by myself without my husbands help :)

nodes.title: Quality is awesome, looks great
nodes.name: Amy B.
nodes.content: Quality is awesome, looks great and classes are so challenging

nodes.title: Bike is great, easy to
nodes.name: Carlie M.
nodes.content: Bike is great, easy to use, only issues are that there isn’t a “free mode” where you can just ride and track metrics. Also the classes don’t load sometimes, my WiFi is on and connected, I can get to the Stryde App and select a class but it never connects to the actual class.

nodes.title: It works great
nodes.name: Edgar M.
nodes.content: It works great

nodes.title: Solid, well built bike, so
nodes.name: Lynn T.
nodes.content: Solid, well built bike, so far. Smooth, comfortable ride. Tablet is clear and Stryde classes are great. Takes time to figure out all the features of tablet due to lack of manual but each day my rating of the bike goes up as I figure it all out. Customer support responds quickly. Delivery by independent company was terrible, however.

nodes.title: We are in love with
nodes.name: Christina S.
nodes.content: We are in love with our new Stryde bike. It fits so nicely in a small space and allows us to get a great sweat from our home. Stryde has also had great customer support which has helped us feel comfortable setting up and using our new piece of equipment.

nodes.title: I’m so glad I went
nodes.name: Ashley P.
nodes.content: I’m so glad I went with Stryde! Their customer service has been great and I enjoy all of the classes.

nodes.title: I love my Stryde bike!
nodes.name: Camilla C.
nodes.content: I love my Stryde bike! I can watch Netflix, YouTube, or the workouts which are killer. I can already see definition in my legs, I have more energy. It’s well worth the money and customer service was excellent when I reached out for an update.

nodes.title: We love the bike -
nodes.name: Amy C.
nodes.content: We love the bike - the assembly was easy and it looks sleek! I wish there were more studios highlighted, but that may be due to Covid. Loving the option to do spin classes from home!

nodes.title: I love the bike from
nodes.name: Felix V.
nodes.content: I love the bike from downloading the apps to changing the settings on the tablet. The only thing I wish would change would be the placement of the seat tight-screw. The handle faces right as you are looking at the bike and the handle keeps hitting my thigh. Other than that it's perfect and for the price of a Peloton; it doesn't compare. Would help to have financing, luckily I was able to put it on a credit card that offered me 0% interest for 12 months.

nodes.title: Best purchase all year!! I
nodes.name: Paula H.
nodes.content: Best purchase all year!! I LOVE this bike!!!

nodes.title: Love how easy the bike
nodes.name: Kacy K.
nodes.content: Love how easy the bike was to set up!! Took me about 30 minutes to get it set up. So far I’m happy with my purchase.

nodes.title: The bike is well made
nodes.name: Marie A.
nodes.content: The bike is well made and easy to put together. My only critique would be the spin studios. Some of their audio needs improvement. There are classes where you can hear the instructor well and the music sounds very low in the background. Music in spin is very motivating so having the right volume for Instructions and music is imperative. I also have difficulty at times discerning some of their instructions. I’m in PA and have attended spin classes for 11 years. The terminology seems different depending upon the area it seems. Overall as I stated previously, the bike is superior. Hopefully more apps and options are added in the future.

nodes.title: Great customer service. I absolutely
nodes.name: Nikki M.
nodes.content: Great customer service. I absolutely love my bike! 💗

nodes.title: I am glad I got
nodes.name: Lashonda C.
nodes.content: I am glad I got this bike!!! I don't regret getting it at all.

nodes.title: Excellent customer service, from the
nodes.name: Carla S.
nodes.content:
Excellent customer service, from the very first time I sent them an email after making a purchase, until delivery... and any time I needed assistance! Once my bike arrived, I needed assistance setting up the tablet, so
I sent an email on Sunday, hoping they would see it Monday... but they responded that same day!! I was very happy, because I didn’t have to wait until the next day to use my bike for the first time!! 
The bike is like a dream... great quality, easy to assemble, beautiful, and the best part ... I can use it super early in the morning, or late at night without worrying about waking up the kids ... it’s super quiet :) 
I’m very happy with this bike, and highly recommend it. The only thing I did was add handle bar wrapping to make the handle bars more comfy and to customize it with a bit of color ... but that’s also a good thing, because the bike is so elegant. I just like more cushion on the handle bars, it’s a personal choice. ( Any road bike shop will have the wrapping tape, you can do it your self... or take the handle bars to the shop to have it done ... )

nodes.title: This bike is amazing!! I
nodes.name: Anna R.
nodes.content: This bike is amazing!! I have never been so excited to workout at home.

nodes.title: Loving my purchase so far!
nodes.name: Amy B.
nodes.content: Loving my purchase so far!

nodes.title: Bike is sleek and sturdy
nodes.name: Ancelle J.
nodes.content: Bike is sleek and sturdy looking. Very impressed with the quality and most especially, the customer service. Love my stryde bike!

nodes.title: So far so good. I've
nodes.name: Andrea A.
nodes.content: So far so good. I've been able to ride it about 4 times now. The only improvements would be make it easier to download other apps, such as Youtube, Spotify, Hulu, etc. and maybe displaying your heart rate on the screen from personal Bluetooth heart monitor as you workout

nodes.title: The bike has made all.
nodes.name: Jordan G.
nodes.content: The bike has made all. the. difference in my exercise routine! It is so convenient to hop on at any time throughout the day and get a quick ride in. The bike is beautifully and well made and you can't beat the huge tablet!

nodes.title: Loving my bike. Overall I
nodes.name: Julie S.
nodes.content: Loving my bike. Overall I think it is a great product, and love the fact the tablet is “unlocked”. My only complaints are minor— I am finding it a little hard to clip in, but hoping that will get better with more use. The lever for tightening the seat adjustment is definitely in the way, hitting my leg every time. Luckily I am the only one riding my bike, so I simply took off the black lever part after adjusted! Also, the tablet speed seems a little slow. But other than that, I think it’s wonderful and I’m very happy with my purchase!

nodes.title: Besides the screen there is
nodes.name: Rodrigo V.
nodes.content: Besides the screen there is nothing very special about the bike that would explain the cost compared to other bikes in the market, the pre installed programs are of no use.. all gym bikes I have used I have been able to track the time and calories I spend while on the bike this seem fairly simple thing that I am unable to do with this bike

nodes.title: I was very get to
nodes.name: Brian M.
nodes.content: I was very get to getting riding on my new Stryde bike! The bike itself is solid, smooth, and sleek. We had the bike setup in less than 45 minutes and then took a couple more minutes to appreciate the fantastic engineering of this machine. You can see how much thought was put into the design and materials used to create it. The bike and classes get you’re heart pumping to start you’re day off with an awesome cardio workout before you even leave your home. Highly recommended!

nodes.title: So happy with my purchase,
nodes.name: Fiorella C.
nodes.content: So happy with my purchase, my husband and I use the bike almost daily since it arrived. I love the fact that the subscription is optional and the many apps that can be used in the tablet. Bike was easy to set up. Would definitely recommend!

nodes.title: The bike is great. Sleek,
nodes.name: Jose L.
nodes.content: The bike is great. Sleek, well-built, comfortable to ride, and silent. Tablet is fully unlocked so you can run most apps in it while riding. Worth every penny.

nodes.title: Love this bike and the
nodes.name: Shannon L.
nodes.content: Love this bike and the best customer service!!!

nodes.title: The bike was shipped safely
nodes.name: Joseph W.
nodes.content: The bike was shipped safely and was easy to set up by myself. I had one iasue that waa solved with a quixk email. I now have the apps loaded I want on the unlocked tablet and I'm working out every morning. Super solid quality for the price.

nodes.title: Love this bike! Best investment
nodes.name: Kim T.
nodes.content: Love this bike! Best investment I’ve made. Smooth ride, love the screen and love the classes through the stride app!!

nodes.title: I’m pretty happy with my
nodes.name: Aaron K.
nodes.content: I’m pretty happy with my purchase. Good workouts, a lot of options, easy to put together, and smooth ride. There are a number of tweaks I’d make - the handlebar doesn’t always stay in position and slides down; the leaderboards aren’t very useful because you can only see the top 5 so you don’t know where you are unless you’re in the top 5; and I wish the music was louder (not the instructors, the music specifically).

nodes.title: So far, we've enjoyed our
nodes.name: Sarah H.
nodes.content: So far, we've enjoyed our bike. The workouts we've been able to do and the feeling we get when we finish a ride is amazing! We did have a little hiccup with a piece of the bike, but customer service worked quickly with us to fix the issue and we are awaiting a response from Stryde's service partner now.

nodes.title: We received our bike about
nodes.name: Casey W.
nodes.content: We received our bike about 2 weeks ago, and it's been all we expected and more - we love it! Customer service has been very responsiveness for any questions we've had along the way.

nodes.title: Initial impressions are pretty good
nodes.name: Christopher C.
nodes.content: Initial impressions are pretty good (between good and great…I rounded up). I’m noticing that none of the classes I’m taking so far reference anything about my RPM, only resistance. The one class I found that did reference RPM had a pace number that seemed super human, but was likely due to instructor not using a stryde bike but rather a different model. I guess the advantage to Peloton is all the instructors are using the same equipment so instructions are pretty seamless, but still, I’m not sure its worth another grand to have the exact same specs. I’m pretty happy with the quality of instructors, but if I had one wish, it would be that there was a Sonos app for the Stryde tablet so I could connect with my Sonos sound system. The speakers on the tablet aren’t the greatest. I want that BASS!!

nodes.title: We enjoy our new Stryde
nodes.name: Clarke
nodes.content: We enjoy our new Stryde bike. We were able to bring our favorite studio with us to a different state!

nodes.title: It works as advertised
nodes.name: Fernand C.
nodes.content: It works as advertised

nodes.title: So far I love this
nodes.name: Dominika R.
nodes.content: So far I love this bike , love classes, love the fact that I am not tied to having membership in order to use it . It is slick and looks great in my front room , winter will go faster with it and last but not least customer service is great , quick to respond to all emails with questions.It was great decision to buy Stryde .

nodes.title: I did a ton of
nodes.name: Patrisha H.
nodes.content: I did a ton of research before I chose Stryde over Myx and Peloton. I thought the Stryde app would have more content and that the bike would have the same metrics as other bikes. Getting my tablet up and running with apps outside of Stryde was harder than it should have been. I definitely prefer using the Peloton App because I like to do long scenic rides than just classes. I wish using the free ride would register in my workout count. And most of all, I wish the bike could tell me my miles ridden. The bike is great. Make the metrics and apps better and I'll take it all back. If I would have known how difficult the tablet would be, I probably would have opted a cheaper bike and used an iPad.

nodes.title: Other than the shipping process
nodes.name: Alisha H.
nodes.content: Other than the shipping process being a nightmare, my stride bike is amazing! Great investment!

nodes.title: I like the bike alot.
nodes.name: Kareim K.
nodes.content: I like the bike alot. I had an issue with the set up and it took a long time to figure out. They sent a tech to me but I missed him for some reason and I was home all day waiting. The issue turned out to be easily fixable by me so it would have been helpful if the folks I had been in touch with online had done more to help. Also, I am trying to figure out how to log my stats while using other programs. There doesn't seem to be any information available on using the interface. I emailed the help email but have not gotten a reply.

nodes.title: I love my Stryde! Setup
nodes.name: Allison T.
nodes.content: I love my Stryde! Setup wasn't too hard, smooth ride, and there's a pretty good variety of classes on the Stryde app. The unlocked tablet and ability to use other apps is amazing. Very happy with my purchase.

nodes.title: Amazing bike, high quality, just
nodes.name: Stacey M.
nodes.content: Amazing bike, high quality, just wish for the price you pay it would come with an instructional DVD about set up with the monitor, account, classes etc

nodes.title: I really like the bike
nodes.name: Megan W.
nodes.content:
I really like the bike itself, and I love the idea of streaming from real, different, studios. 
The bike came much faster than the estimate and delivery of the bike itself was fine. The tablet was an issue. I never received any notice from Stryde that anything had shipped and only the company that delivered the bike reached out. The tablet was allegedly delivered a week before I even got any notice that it had gone a different route than the bike. I never got that tablet. 
Now, Stryde CS was amazing. they have a chat feature on FB and responded within minutes. They did send a replacement tablet and kept me in the loop with tracking, so I am very happy with that. 
Everything was actually very simple to put together. I suggest two people because of the weight of the bike and balance.
Notes on the classes-I noticed that there now is only one studio that has new classes, and I find that disappointing. Classes show up in order of newest first, so the other studios are pushed way to the bottom. Diversity overall is lacking, and I hope that they improve this going forward by getting back with some other studios. A small change could also be made by adding a little diversity to the avatars. 
Overall-I love the bike and the idea behind the whole company.

nodes.title: This bike and the classes
nodes.name: Elizabeth F.
nodes.content: This bike and the classes have exceeded my expectations! I’m motivated to ride several times a week and my anti fitness husband is even giving it a go

nodes.title: The bike was not difficult
nodes.name: Randi C.
nodes.content: The bike was not difficult to assemble and the directions very very clear. After 2 weeks of daily use, the Stryde bike functions mostly well, however as taller people the screen is right up in your face when out of the saddle (which is most of the time!). Perhaps a more flexible extension piece could be developed to add on to be able to extend/tilt the tablet. The Stryde classes are great and they add more all the time! They also seem open to making improvements to the app and features so hopefully they follow through to keep up with customer wishes.

nodes.title: I am having the best
nodes.name: Carole H.
nodes.content: I am having the best time with my new bike! It was easy to put together (just give all your bolts one final tighten after the first week. There’s no troubleshooting section yet on Stryde’s website, but Amalia (with Stryde) has been such a patient helper via email. As an Apple person, the tablet’s OS had a learning curve, but my earbuds synced right up and being free to use whatever app we want as inspiration is FANTASTIC (my friends with much pricier bikes are super jealous)!

nodes.title: The bike feels great, study
nodes.name: Jenny N.
nodes.content: The bike feels great, study and well made. The classes have been great workouts and the leaderboard is very motivating to get me to work my hardest! Very, very happy with my Stryde bike. There are a few small software glitches they need to fix and it will be great when the bike can sync with a fitness watch device to track heart rate, but I know those things are coming in the future.

nodes.title: Excellent exercise bike.Well engineered. Very
nodes.name: Patrick A.
nodes.content: Excellent exercise bike.Well engineered. Very sturdy. No wobble or shifting when pedaling hard. However, shortly after receiving the bike it became noisy. So that is the only disappointment. Everything else about the bike is great.

nodes.title: Great bike. Great price. Great
nodes.name: Martel S.
nodes.content: Great bike. Great price. Great customer service. No complaints

nodes.title: Amazing!! This bike has it
nodes.name: Ashlee P.
nodes.content: Amazing!! This bike has it all! I did months of research into what bike on the market was right for our home and family! I purchased the stryde bike for more reasons than one! It is the best bike on the market! Highly recommend this bike!

nodes.title: Honestly it's amazing. Super sturdy,
nodes.name: Katherine P.
nodes.content: Honestly it's amazing. Super sturdy, feels as high quality as the bikes I used to teach on at my spinning studio. Super smooth ride, great resistance adjustment, but the best part is being able to watch whatever I want on the huge screen and still see my RPMs and power output! Honestly I don't know why anyone would buy any spin bike other than the Stryde. I did hours and hours of research before purchasing, and I am even happier with my bike than I thought I'd be.

nodes.title: Love my Stryde bike! Great
nodes.name: Toni B.
nodes.content: Love my Stryde bike! Great quality and easy to assemble. The unique content has made riding fun and a new experience each time!

nodes.title: Love the open platform tablet
nodes.name: Megan H.
nodes.content: Love the open platform tablet allowing you to access multiple apps and webpages, providing more freedom to users. High quality materials, comfortable saddle, and I think best of all, we get to go different soon studios every day right from our own home. I love the selection and freedom to just relax and spin while watching Netflix or grind it out to a 30-45 min class. I'm very happy with my investment that I look forward to using for years to come.

nodes.title: I absolutely love my Stryde
nodes.name: Diana J.
nodes.content: I absolutely love my Stryde bike. There are still some software improvements to be made but the workout is awesome and the bike is sturdy and well made.

nodes.title: The bike is everything I
nodes.name: Maria F.
nodes.content: The bike is everything I wanted. Thank you for continuing to develop the product

nodes.title: Fun to ride, great customer
nodes.name: Tamara T.
nodes.content: Fun to ride, great customer service response time. The seat does keep falling while I'm on my ride no matter how tight I make it.

nodes.title: The bike in itself is
nodes.name: Alex H.
nodes.content: The bike in itself is great. But I am disappointed in the course offerings. I'm a beginner and I need more low-impact classes.

nodes.title: Very happy with the bike.
nodes.name: Mickey B.
nodes.content: Very happy with the bike. Easy to assemble. Solidly constructed and smooth to ride. Would like an easier way to see the parameters for my ride while using another app.

nodes.title: I love the classes. I
nodes.name: Nicole B.
nodes.content: I love the classes. I used to go to a spin studio that has classes just like these and missed them so much, so it’s great to have them at my fingertips. Only reason this isn’t a 5 is because of some tech issues. My tablet won’t connect to wifi so I have to use an Ethernet cable. I also think the tracking may be a little off - I did two 30 minute classes last week with the same instructor and had almost 100kjs difference.

nodes.title: I’m beyond thrilled with my
nodes.name: Clare A.
nodes.content: I’m beyond thrilled with my Stryde bike & am having so much fun with so many classes to choose from as if I’m at their studio. Sturdy design that has exceeded my expectations!!

nodes.title: I’ve had the bike for
nodes.name: Caroline P.
nodes.content:
I’ve had the bike for 3 weeks now and have been riding every day for 60-89 minutes. I am very happy with the purchase. 

Assembly: I put it together myself - took 70 minutes but 11 of those were taking the bike out of the box. The wheel is heavy; I used the styrofoam to leverage the bike to assemble the front and back bars. 

Bike: it’s smooth and the construction is solid. I wish the monitor would move, but it’s great having one. I watch Netflix or read the news and emails. I just added the peloton app so I’ll try that too. For the person who had a wobbly bike, you should reach out to customer service; I had that problem initially but found that I hadn’t tightened the screws appropriately. If you have a problem with the lever hitting your leg, pull the knob and it’ll turn.

Customer service: fantastic! I’ve had some questions about assembly (wobbly bike and lever hitting my leg) and adding an app. Amalia is just so responsive and fast! Even before buying the bike, she was great. I feel that responsive customer service goes a long way and was a big factor in my decision to buy. 

Overall, I’m very happy.

nodes.title: Bike is just okay. Arrived
nodes.name: Sierra P.
nodes.content: Bike is just okay. Arrived on time, set up was mostly easy with the exception of the screen. I had to email customer service at least 7 times with various questions. There is no customer service phone number, but they are quick to reply to email. Wish the screen had come with a manual. Not very user friendly because you can’t just download the apps you want easily. You have to contact there customer service. Tried the Stryde app but it was very glitchy so I am sticking with the Peloton app. I’m disappointed in the quality of the bike. Makes terrible squeaking noise every time you’re in third position. Quite annoying. This was an ok purchase for the price, but I wouldn’t purchase again.

nodes.title: Love the bike. It is

nodes.title: Great bike. Customer service is
nodes.name: Patricia R.

nodes.title: I researched exercise spin bikes
nodes.name: Alison G.
nodes.content: I researched exercise spin bikes for months and finally decided on Stryde. The main reason I chose Stryde is that the bike is the same great quality as Peloton however what sold me is the interface. I am not locked into a monthly payment with Stryde. I can use apps like peloton and multiple others or even watch Netflix, etc. I did subscribe to Stryde to use their classes with City Cycle, High Ride, and I love Ride with Fred and many other classes available through Stryde so for now I’m satisfied and will continue to subscribe ($30/month) is a steal as one in person class is the same price. My kids are riding it too. The bike was fairly easy to put together, there are no instructions that come to download the apps, however customer service is highly responsive and easily troubleshooted anything I couldn’t figure out. I emailed them and received help within minutes. So far so good! Riding 4-5 times a week now and loving it!

nodes.title: I am very happy with
nodes.name: Michael R.
nodes.content: I am very happy with my bike. I use it with the Peleton app or while watching Netflix. The new picture-in-picture feature is great. I had some initial tablet problems, but Amalia answered my e-mails promptly and made all my problems go away! She even helped me figure out how to download apps and use the tablet to best advantage. nodes.title: Excellent bike, quality is outstanding.

nodes.content:

Love the class variety, but would like a couple of things: 1) more breakdown into the effort for the classes would be helpful 2) would like a free ride option that helps change up resistance

Otherwise, use the bike daily and look forward to continued updates.

nodes.title: The best piece of exercise

nodes.title: The mechanism is smooth and
nodes.name: Raymond B.
nodes.content: The mechanism is smooth and the bike rides well. I agree with another reviewer that the handlebars are very slightly out of alignment which is not a big deal, but not something you’d expect from a relatively expensive item. I also wish the handlebars were able to be raised higher. The tablet response is slow and for some reason it frequently can’t find my wifi even though my laptop and phone can. Turning it off and rebooting cures the problem. The tablet is extraordinarily slow to respond. If split screen is used, the icons of the Stryde app overlap and it’s hard to select the desired one. I’m hoping the picture-in-picture mode, when available, will alleviate this problem. I nevertheless enjoy the bike, use it frequently, and would recommend it. None of the above mentioned items are show toppers, but potential buyers should be aware of them. I chose the Stryde over Peleton because I didn’t want to be saddled with a monthly subscription fee. I’ve had no problem finding great spin classes on YouTube.

nodes.name: Alexandra S.

nodes.title: I like the bike a
nodes.name: Saverio F.
nodes.content:
I like the bike a lot. The screen works great, the angling of the screen is nicely done. The handles are overall comfortable. The water bottle and weight holders are well placed. The double function foot pedal which accommodate regular as well as biking shoes are great.
 
There are 3 things that I wish we could adjust:
1. Height of the handlebars with respect to seat height. I am pretty tall and I raise the seat to level 7 but the maximum I can raise the handlebar is basically level with the seat - not a little higher as I would prefer
2. The magnets in the weel fell off, I found them and had to taped them in (maybe there is a better way to secure them
3. The seat itself is uncomfortable. I bought a more padded one for $25 to deal with that and now don't mind riding on the saddle.

nodes.name: David B.
nodes.content:
Great product, good service. Some things we'd like to see:
"Free Ride" be included in your History.
A scenic Free Ride. Would love do ride in different scenes and places.
Display time and mileage.
A larger listing of riders who are ahead of you, so you can push yourself, including the person directly in front of you.

nodes.title: Can’t say enough. Live it.

nodes.title: Love, love this bike and
nodes.name: Kristyn K.
nodes.content: Love, love this bike and the workouts. The customer service is top notch as well!

nodes.title: Love it!
nodes.name: Jeff C.
nodes.content: Love it!

nodes.title: The bike has a very
nodes.name: Gina G.
nodes.content:
The bike has a very smooth ride and was easy to assemble. I did a lots of research on bikes prior to the purchase as there things I wanted on the bike which were very important. My daughter was researching as well for herself and found the bike and she purchased one as well. The Stryde bike had close to all the things I wanted and this is why I chose it. 
 The saddle post has the silver piece sticking out far under the saddle which is something I believe Stryde is working on. The bike will be a great training tool and will help improve my outdoor cycling. The tablet and software have been disappointing. Customer Service has been great with trying to resolve issues. I've had the bike over a month and I'm still experiencing problems with the tablet such as it will rotate if I open certain apps (apps recommended by Stryde) and fuzziness on the Peloton app. This has been frustrating. 
Because my training is important to me, I want my metrics in front of me. The PIP is very good as it shows cadence, resistance and output. It would be great to see my heart rate displayed on the screen also. Another really great addition would be mileage to be included in the metrics. 
The last thing I'd like to add is the importance of knowledge for instructors. I taught spinning for over 15 years. Safety is so important. The few instructors I tried did not appear knowledgeable in indoor cycling instruction. There were many things being done which either were extremely unsafe for the riders or had absolutely no benefit. This is concerning because there are many folks new to cycling (per the Stryde FaceBook page) and they could easily get injured. 
I am cancelling my Stryde app because I won't do these classes for the reasons mentioned but I have the Peloton app and can do online videos as well. 
Overall I am very happy with the bike itself and the Customer Service. I've ridden many indoor cycling bikes and have an original Spinning bike (about 25 years old) and the Styde bike itself is very good. When the new saddle post is re-designed I would like to have mine replaced. One other suggestion would be to have more space between the tablet and the bottle cages so it is easier to grab the water bottles. Or the ability to raise the tablet to allow for more space. This is a minor issue. 
Thanks for the outstanding Customer Service!
Gina

I’m new to indoor cycling so don’t have much to compare against but can’t say I am missing anything with this purchase.

nodes.title: So far so good! Used
nodes.name: Carla F.
nodes.content: So far so good! Used it a handful of times. Customer service has been great - very responsive, which I appreciate! I am still going through classes but I do wish there were more sprint/hill based workouts, less rhythm. I stopped doing soul cycle because it was too rhythm based plus the screens are SO close to your face that it is hard to do a push up on the handlebars! Also, on the note of handlebars, the grip on the top side is uncomfortable - it is like the finger groves should be at the bottom. I also wish the resistance knob was smaller so you wouldn't hit it with your thigh when standing & spinning.

nodes.title: Love it!
nodes.name: Karen C.
nodes.content: Love it!

nodes.title: I am a huge fan
nodes.name: Lindsay E.
nodes.content:
I am a huge fan of the the Stryde bike! I ordered it in November, and it took one week to arrive, which was amazing compared to the long order times at other companies. The setup was easy -- the bike was really heavy, but my husband was able to drag it up our stairs, and then we set the rest of it up in about 30 minutes together. I have both the Styde app and the Peloton app, which I learned how to download via a YouTube video. On the Stryde app, my favorite studio is High Ride Cycle because it has fun choreography. I mostly use the Peloton app though, with the Stryde app minimized in the corner so I can monitor cadence, etc. 

I have a couple of complaints: The Stryde app is a little buggy. If you pause a ride, you lose all your stats and it won't log the ride. You can also only choose white avatars, and not a lot of women, which doesn't feel very inclusive. Why not just let us upload our photos, Stryde? I prefer the Peloton app because each ride has more details: the play list, etc, which I find helpful when I'm feeling unmotivated to ride. Like, "Oh, I like all these songs, so this will be a fun ride." Also the Stryde app doesn't update very often -- the main screen has had the same Fergie ride with a November 2020 date for a week or so now, and it's nearly January, and the classes have very few details of what songs you'll be working out to and what kind of class you're doing. On the bike itself, there is also kind of a weird adjustment lever near the seat that was hitting me awkwardly, which I was able to unscrew and remove and it solved that issue. 

Overall, though, I REALLY like this bike. The ride is smooth. (I've never ridden a Peloton bike, so I can't compare to that, but I have taken a handful of SoulCycle classes and this bike doesn't feel any different to me.) My mental health is much improved now that I am getting regular cardio. I think it looks nice enough in my house. It was literally $1000 less than a Peloton bike! I was able to buy bike shoes at a local shop and they installed the clips that came with the bike, but I used my normal gym shoes for the first month without issue. The Peloton app works just fine (app users don't get nearly as many stats, but it's 1/3 the price per month), and the Stryde app has some really fun classes (shout out to Alissa Benson at High Ride Cycle in Denver!). 

Overall, I am really happy I bought a Stryde bike. Once the coronavirus is over, I anticipate returning to my Pilates studio, and this bike becoming just one facet of my workout routine instead of the bulk of my workout routine. So I really love that the app is optional as my needs change. I wasn't a spinner before, but now I'm into it and use it at least 4 times a week.

nodes.title: Overall solid build quality. I’m
nodes.name: Ashley R.
nodes.content:
Overall solid build quality. I’m nice and settled into the bike now. And the joints/screws/ connections/finishes:materials all still seem pretty solid and well intact. Clipping the shoes in took some getting used to and I had to slightly loosen the adjustment in the pedal to get clipped in. 

The tablet was a bit buggy for me in terms of connecting to internet but I found (through screwing through a lot of settings) that it was due to an obscure setting in my mesh router system for ipv6 pass through. Now it works full time, mostly with occasional drop due to Bluetooth and 2.4 Wi-Fi signals interfering with one another. Having to use my mobile hotspot long term would not be an option.

I’m a bigger guy (6’ 3”- 280lbs) and It’s pretty sturdy. Not a lot of wobbling or nervous rocking. I Wish there was just a bit more vertical room in the handle bars, ability to pull them closer, and seat for better ergonomics/comfort. This would go a long way in the more active in and out of the saddle/core engagement classes. 

Customer support is great and responsive and you can tell they try to address your issue. Even if there’s not an immediate resolution. 

I haven’t really tried using too many other apps yet (peloton, if it, etc) but the support for getting those up and running seems to be there based on the Facebook group and customer service responsiveness. 

The stryde classes are pretty good overall. A few more filters for options would be nice and tagging some of the classes as beginner/intermediate/advanced or calorie burn/fat burn/endurance etc would be helpful. Would also like more guidance on what to expect in rhythm, rides vs beginner vs low impact vs more advanced classes. The instructors are energetic and there are quite a few to pick from. Plenty of music genres to pick from (although selfishly I’d like more hip hop/r and b choices). classes are added pretty frequently so the library is pretty well built so far. 

The delivery time was great. Less than two weeks vs 10+ weeks for some of the competitors.

nodes.title: We love our Stryde bike!
nodes.name: Eric H.
nodes.content: We love our Stryde bike! I wish there had been digital assembly videos sent prior to receiving the bike with info on something as simple as how to open the box since the manual inside mentions this but it’s a little too late. Plus videos on proper seat height, depth, etc for individual riders. Assembly was relatively easy and the bike feels super solid and secure. We have been taking advantage of the “Free Ride” option while utilizing Peloton app content which has been great! Our daughter prefers to watch something on YouTube so the flexibility of the open interface is awesome and a major selling point for us! Having 2 sided peddles is helpful for new bikers too, allowing my wife and I to decide how much we ride the bike before investing in a pair of clip-in cycling shoes. Hopefully the “Free Ride” option will connect with an Apple Watch in the future to help track heartbeat and exercise. We can connect our AirPods which is helpful when others are in the room. Overall, the bike looks great, has a relatively small foot print and has been great for our exercise routine, just wish we had bought it earlier in the winter!

nodes.title: This bike is pretty great

nodes.content:

Otherwise this is a great bike- set up was easy, took about 20 minutes with two people and I really love that you have the option to not purchase the subscription plan. I started out just watching YouTube spin classes but ended up getting the subscription. The teachers are not only very motivating, but the tracking of my workouts is so amazing to see how I did after each ride!

nodes.title: Delivery of the product was
nodes.name: Stacy M.
nodes.content:
Delivery of the product was slow. The local delivery vendor did not deliver the bike for 3 weeks after its arrival to their facility. Stryde customer service helped get delivery set up at first available date.

My bike has the pedal "click" that I have read other users report. Despite extreme tightening of the seat and handlebars in position they seem to slip down over time (I am 120 pounds). 

Software is buggy. I have to restart the tablet every time I ride or the resistance does not register. I have enjoyed the Stryde content and plan to keep my subscription. I don't regret the purchase but disappointed with some of the quality issues.

nodes.title: I love my bike but

nodes.title: Awesome bike!

nodes.title: I wish the adjusters for
nodes.name: Jessica Y.
nodes.content:
I wish the adjusters for the seat and monitor had a slot they'd insert into at the various heights in lieu of having to try to it turn it until it's as tight as possible. Especially the seat, I have to readjust it and tighten it at the desired level at the beginning of every ride and by the end the seat has dropped down again. Sometimes I have to readjust and retighten it during the ride if it drops down too far. I've even had other/stronger people try to tighten it for me. 
Where if it went into a slot at incremental points/heights, that would help ensure it would stay put.
That's been my main issue but, a few other minor items:

Also the screws for the weight holder don't go in all the way so the weight holders kinda wobble around.
I wish there was a separate spot below the monitor that noted your speed & resistance level. When just riding to YouTube videos, I end up just gauging speed off of the instructor and resistance from what feels right.

nodes.title: First off it sucks to
nodes.name: Chris O.
nodes.content:
First off it sucks to write a review that’s so mixed. We love the bike and we love the app. We particularly love the High Ride classes! The bummer is receiving the bike was awful. We got no notification it was arriving. They rescheduled multiple times and missed deliveries multiple times. I spent hours on hold trying to figure out where the bike was. Stryde customer support while very prompt was not able to do anything, they just sent emails to the last mile logistics company. After the 4th day of waiting around my house being promised the bike was on its way just drove to the logistics center and got it myself. They were pretty surprised. I read reviews of this logistics company and it seems like a very common experience. As a business you own the experience your vendors provide, I would urge you to find a logistics company that matches the quality of your bikes and classes. I would have paid more to have it delivered promptly and when promised. 

Chris

Would be 4 &3/4 stars if allowed. 3 in the family ride this bike at different levels of intensity without issue. Assembly was no problem at all. Bike might be a little heavy for some folks to assembly without assistance , due to weight of bike.

nodes.title: I love my bike. The
nodes.name: Eva P.
nodes.content:
I love my bike. The shipping was very fast. I received it within 10 days of ordering it.. It was easy to set up. It took a minute to understand how to download different apps (go to YouTube to figure out how to download on stryde) and how to do the apps with the stryde freeride system.

My tablet was glitchy and customer service was very quick to send me out a new one and that problem is solved.

And obviously it takes a little bit to understand all the ins and outs of the bike. Now that I have figured it out, it's fabulous!

Overall, I am happy with going with stryde over any other bike. It is solid like a spin class bike and I love the tablet. 5 stars.

nodes.title: Love my Stryde bike. Is

nodes.title: Love this bike! Sturdy, sleek,
nodes.name: Jennifer H.
nodes.content: Love this bike! Sturdy, sleek, and easy to adjust. The unlocked tablet with the pic-in-pic is a game changer for me because it eliminates that many more excuses to not get a workout in. Wanna watch your show? Do it while you ride. Need to attend (but not participate in) a virtual seminar/meeting? Do it while you ride. Need to get some online work done? Do it while you ride. Audio/video quality are great, and I love that the bike is basically silent. So glad I took the leap!

nodes.title: I love my bike. It

nodes.title: I love it! The quality

I also love that the resistance dial is similar to other bikes out there so there is very little converting to figure out your resistance during a ride. The picture in a picture is awesome too! My only complaint is from the delivery of the bike. It was scheduled to arrive, I had taken off from work but it never showed. When I emailed to ask what happened, I was told it had been delivered. After many emails, and about another 2 weeks of waiting, it finally arrived.

nodes.title: Not sure the bike is
nodes.name: Corie C.
nodes.content: Not sure the bike is worth the price. I specifically bought this bike do to the unlocked App feature but apparently there is a major glitch that is not allowing this feature to work right now. I could have bought a $300 bike at Costco and used my iPad instead. I can’t seem to get help support to give me a timeline of when this will be fixed.

nodes.title: I did exhaustive measures researching
nodes.name: Brittany U.
nodes.content: I did exhaustive measures researching studio bikes and was torn between this and the better known bike. I think what sold me was the price and then the unlocked tablet! I really appreciate that you aren’t forced into a monthly membership. Now in regards to the bike, I am seriously impressed! You can tell the bike is of high quality. The tablet is huge and the ease of use (for an iPhone user) is actually not bad. The volume on the tablet is fine, ability to link with Bluetooth headphones is also pretty easy. I appreciate the Picture in Picture while using other apps. Also customer service has been extremely helpful and quick to answer.

nodes.title: In general it’s an excellent
nodes.name: Tara R.
nodes.content: In general it’s an excellent bike and the classes are amazing. It has glitches and issues periodically but the customer service people work hard to fix your problems pretty quickly!

nodes.title: Love the bike. Deducting 1

nodes.content: Love the bike. Deducting 1 star for lack of direction to download apps and neglect to include removal of flywheel cap in instructions. Minor inconveniences that were resolved by joining the Stryde group on Reddit - the most informed and respectful group.

nodes.title: Initially the bike was working
nodes.name: Ken C.
nodes.content:
Initially the bike was working perfect, nice and smooth. Recently a knock developed in the crank and supposedly new parts are being sent to me so this can be fixed. The parts are on back-order. :-(
Sometimes the resistance number will not display the correct resistance setting and is stuck on "0". The system must restarted to get it working again.
Otherwise I am satisfied with the purchase. I hope this crank issue gets fixed soon as it is rather annoying. I am looking forward the the availability of the heart rate monitor.

nodes.title: I absolutely love everything about
nodes.name: Alyssa L.

nodes.title: Most all elements of the
nodes.name: Doug P.

Most all elements of the bike itself are "very good"; so I recommend Stryde
Response on bike questions is "very good" and prompt
The tablet is slow and documentation is inadequate 
Response to tablet issues is inadequate and sometimes ignores the specific question asked (mainly just refers back to the Stryde sheet on tablets - which doesn't cover the issue or I wouldn't have asked the question since I had already studied the sheet)

nodes.title: I think my Stryde bike

nodes.title: Haven't been true to an
nodes.name: Robert S.
nodes.content: Haven't been true to an exercise routine yet but I am using the bike 2 to 3 times a week for 30-45 minutes. Either following a virtual bike ride on you tube or watching news on TV.. I always use the "free ride" on the tablet to keep my cadence, time, output and distance at hand. I am waiting for someone to come up with an update, app or other means to track progress during the free ride. So far, I have gotten used to the seat and am comfortable with loading apps and operating the tablet. No issues with the bike operation or construction, it seems very well built. I plan on purchasing some riding shoes and eventually using instructors either via Stryde or Pelaton subscription.
